articles.author: Anirudh Singh
articles.title: Twitter Reactions: Heinrich Klaasen's fiery ton blows Australia away in 4th ODI – SA vs AUS 2023 - Cricket Times
articles.description: South Africa won by the 4th ODI against Australia by a heavy margin of 164 runs. Heinrich Klaasen was adjudged Player of the Match for his brilliant performance with the bat.
articles.content: In an entertaining showdown at SuperSport Park, Centurion, South Africa, the home team secured a convincing win over Australia in the 4th ODI of the five-match series. South Africa’s batting prowess … [+4813 chars]
